dimensions: Sheet: 22.4 x 16.8 cm (8 13/16 x 6 5/8 in. ) (irregular sheet)
title: Design for Silver Chalice with Wide Shallow Cup and Greek Cross Motif
description: Presentation design for silver chalice with wide shallow cup and wider base; flat circular pillow-shaped piece upper stem; engraved scallops along cup rim; Greek cross below "pillow;" irregular outline middle of stem.
name: Drawing
